sentences.sContent: a young salesman eager to clinch the deal
sentences.sCn: 一名急于想做成这笔生意的年轻推销员

words.tran: [机] 紧钳；敲弯钉头的工具

trans.tranCn: 扭住；敲弯；最终确定或解决
trans.tranOther: to finally agree on something or get something after trying very hard
a situation in which two people who love each other hold each other tightly
